## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                              | Type     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | Name of the icon to use in the badge                                     | `string` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the icon. Possible values: `x-small`, `small`, `medium`, `large` | `string` |
